duties_responsibilities.duty: Assists with data gathering including detailed document reviews and database creation/ management.
Performs detailed analyses of project schedule delays, project cost records, productivity, change orders and other issues related to design and construction.
Utilizes various computer software to analyze and model schedules, contractor production rates and costs.
Creates high quality work product and demonstrates exceptional quality control.
Prepares client-ready work product for senior level review.
Supports company and practice development efforts.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in engineering with graduation between December 2024 and June 2025
